name: 卡根·埃菲·阿克
name_full: 卡根·埃菲·阿克 Çagan Efe Ak
introduction: Child actor, cinema and TV series actor. He was born in Istanbul. He continues his primary education education.The little actor met with the cameras through commercials. 'Cagan Efe Ak', who appeared in LC Waikiki and Vodafone commercials, had his first acting experience with the series 'Bir Gun Bir Cocuk', then played the character 'Sehzade Murat' in 'Muhtesem Yuzyil Kosem / Magnificent Century Kösem'.The child actor is also interested in Aikido sport. In 2016, he played Sarp's childhood in the TV series 'Icerde', became famous with this role, and in 2018 he appeared in the films 'Ailecek Saskiniz', 'Deliler Fatih'in Fermani'. In 2020, he played the character of 'Iskender' in the 'Tozkoparan Iskender' series, where he played the leading role. It continues to take part in new projects.
